channel.title: TwitterAPI on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in TwitterAPI on Memo Tut

item.title: Create a TwitterBot with Python!
item.description: ## What is TwitterBot? Bot is the etymology of Robot, and refers to something that automatically does something. On Twitter Auto Tweet Bot Auto Like Bot Auto follow bot There are various bots. What are the benefits of Bot? Automatic Tweets act like notifications. For example, “we tweet automatically when the live information of your favorite artist is updated”. Auto Like and Auto Follow serve as a tool to let an unspecified number of people know your account.

item.title: Beginners of GoogleMaps API and Twitter API made tweet map
item.description: #Introduction If I knew when and where I tweeted, I thought it would be fun to look like a life log, so I made a tweet map. It is the first time to touch GoogleMaps API and TwtterAPI. Thanks to various sites. .. .. .. ![Screenshot 2019-11-25 14.14.55.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/445408/d4ca8dcd-e24a-ca6e-b09c-(df19ed888805.png) ⬆️ This is when riding a bicycle on the Shimanami Kaido (It’s fun to know where you were and what you were doing!
